thread.title: Hotwire Announces Sale, Shares Historical Travel Data to Celebrate 15th Birthday
thread.title_full: Hotwire Announces Sale, Shares Historical Travel Data to Celebrate 15th Birthday - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hotwire Announces Sale, Shares Historical Travel Data to Celebrate 15th Birthday
text:
Hotwire.com
Travel Site Encourages Customers to Celebrate with Big Savings on Hotel Rooms from October 15-21
Atlanta, Chicago and Orlando Top Lists of Most Popular U.S. Travel Destinations
SEATTLE , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today Hotwire.com ® announced details of its 15 th Birthday Sale and encouraged customers to celebrate with low prices on hotel rooms between October 15 and 21 . Hotwire customers can save an additional $15 on Hot Rate® hotel rooms in hundreds of locations, some of which are already reduced by up to 60 percent of their normal price † .
"At Hotwire, we're all about empowering people to take more trips by giving them great deals and inspiring them to be more adventurous," says Hotwire CEO Henrik Kjellberg . "So how else would a group of life-long travel geeks celebrate our 15 th birthday? With a sale on travel accommodations, of course."
Hotwire® also shared the top 15 travel destinations for flights, hotel bookings and car rentals throughout its 15 year history. More customers have booked flights to Atlanta than any other U.S. airport; Chicago tops the list for hotel bookings; and more Hotwire customers rented cars in Orlando than any other U.S. city.
About Hotwire
Hotwire.com is a leading discount travel site with low rates on airline tickets, hotel rooms, rental cars and vacation packages. Launched in 2000, Hotwire, Inc. obtains deep discounts from its travel suppliers to help travelers book unsold airline seats, hotel rooms and rental cars. Hotwire.com is an award winning website and Hotwire, Inc. is an operating company within Expedia, Inc. For more information, visit http://www.hotwire.com . In addition to Hotwire.com, Hotwire, Inc. also operates www.carrentals.com .
©2015 Hotwire, Inc. All rights reserved. Hotwire, Hot Rate, Hotwire.com and the Hotwire logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Hotwire, Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. CST # 2053390-40.
Contacts:

carpeters@hotwire.com
425-679-7776
† Receive an instant $15 coupon discount off a Hot Rate® hotel stay when booking on Hotwire. The price of the qualifying booking must be at least $150 including taxes and fees. Restrictions: Coupon must be redeemed by 11:59 PM (Pacific Time) on October 21, 2015 . This offer is from Hotwire.com and is valid for Hotwire.com U.S. customers only. Bookings are subject to availability at Hotwire Hot Rate® hotels at the time of booking and all applicable terms and conditions. Coupon may not be used with other coupons. Coupon discount cannot be applied against supplier-charged fees, cancellation or change penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. In the event that you change or cancel any part of your booking, the coupon will not apply to the changed travel schedule. Terms and conditions of this coupon are as written and cannot be changed by any representation of any unauthorized person, including employees of Hotwire, Inc. Coupon is not transferable and is not redeemable for cash. Hotwire, Inc. may revoke or change this offer at any time. Void where prohibited by law.
